item.title: EHRSHOTv1
item.description: Dataset EHRSHOT (version 1) Release Date 11/02/2023 Leaderboard TBD

item.title: Dataset
item.description: EHRSHOT is a collection of 6,739 deidentified longitudinal electronic health records (EHRs) sourced from Stanford Medicine. Datasheet EHRSHOT contains: 6,739 patients 41.

item.title: Foundation Model
item.description: EHRSHOT releases the weights and code of a 141M-parameter foundation model pretrained on 2.57 million deidentified EHRs from Stanford Hospital.
